analysis.description:
Reentrancy in UpgradeableToken.upgrade (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#507-525):
	External calls:
	- upgradeAgent.upgradeFrom(msg.sender,value) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#518-519)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalUpgraded (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#521-524)

LostAndFoundToken.enableLostAndFound (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#600-615) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_contract.approve(agent,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#615)

Crowdsale.assignTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1261-1263) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1262-1263)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1235-1259):
	External calls:
	- token.setMintAgent(address(this),true) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1242-1244)
	- token.setTransferAgent(address(this),true) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1244)
	- token.setReleaseAgent(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1244-1245)
	- token.mint(address(this),sellable_tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1247-1250)
	- token.setMintAgent(address(this),false) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1252)
	- token.setTransferAgent(team_multisig,true) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1258)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- milieurs_per_eth (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1258-1259)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1293-1299):
	External calls:
	- token.releaseTokenTransfer() (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1296-1297)
	- unsoldTokens = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1297)
	- token.burn(unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1297-1299)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1299)

Reentrancy in GenericCrowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#898-910):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens.mul(10 ** uint256(token.decimals())) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#902-906)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#910)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#910)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#910)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#910)

GenericCrowdsale.GenericCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#835-841) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < start && start < end) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#839-840)

GenericCrowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1046-1050) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1049-1050)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1047-1050)

TokenTranchePricing.TokenTranchePricing (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1160-1192) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < start && start < end) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1182)

TokenTranchePricing.getCurrentTranche (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1195-1202) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- tranches[i].start <= block.timestamp && block.timestamp < tranches[i].end && tokensSold < tranches[i].amount (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1199-1201)

elements.expression: tranches[i].start <= block.timestamp && block.timestamp < tranches[i].end && tokensSold < tranches[i].amount

analysis.description:
Crowdsale.setStartingTime (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1300-1302) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startingTime > block.timestamp && startingTime < endsAt) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#1301-1302)

Crowdsale.setEndingTime (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(endingTime > block.timestamp && endingTime > startsAt) (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol)

CrowdsaleToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#687-688)
CrowdsaleToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#688)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x120a290590e51d7a020ffe039b1f03ff8447a19c.sol#431)
